 which sorta of happened by mistake...I know if i look hard i will be able =

he and i was arguing about our 7 month old at the time not so much arguing =
but you no what I mean...and i said to him "hey she trying to get your atte=
ntion" and he was like I see her and he started like sing to her a silly li=
ttle song that didn't have alot of words in it...well when played back word=
s if was unreal=C2=A0 he says "ignore her..I ignore her..do you her Ursula"=
 he even says my name Now you have to understand what he says forward is NO=

lities weather we know it or not...I think on the other side the have maste=
red it..I'll have to go throw alot of file but everyone who hears it
 can't=
 believe it!

=C2=A0I'm thinking the=
re is faces embedded in sound, it's related to speech, and not just EVP. It=
 seems to be a normal function of our own minds(living or dead), the same a=
s reverse speech. I found some faces in old EVPs from boxes and also in mus=
ic files. The ones from Evanescence are pretty impressive in person, and do=
 not seem to be intentionaly embedded. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I know, it's not ghost=
 hunters, and most don't want to have to think. I=C2=A0think most want this=
 stuff in a neat little box, all well defined, all rules and protocols know=
n, but it just won't stay in one box, or universe for that matter. 
=C2=A0

=C2=A0Frank-S
